text: Jijnesa karuna, nabhomandala o bhumandale ya ache, tara malika ke? Bale dinahallaha. Tini anukampa pradarsanake nija dayitbe lipibad'dha kare niyechena. Tini abasya'i tomaderake keyamatera dina ekatrita karabena. Era agamane kona sandeha ne'i. Yara nijedera ke ksatigrasta kareche, tara'i bisbasa sthapana kare na.
